item.description:
You are cordially invited to attend the
19th Annual
Ballroom Gala
to benefit the Meals On Wheels Program
provided by St. Joseph Community Services, Inc.
DINNER ◊ SILENT AUCTION ◊ RAFFLES ◊ DANCING
MUSIC BY K&S MUSIC
May 4, 2013 6:00 p.m. to 11:00 p.m.
Radisson Hotel, 700 Elm Street, Manchester NH
Parking: $5 in hotel garage with validated ticket
Rooms: Radisson Hotel is offering a discounted rate of $99 for Gala attendees
TICKETS: $55 EACH THROUGH APRIL 12TH,
$60 THEREAFTER
Tickets are available online at
www.MealsOnWheelsNH.org
or call (603) 424-9967 ◊ MasterCard & Visa Accepted
item.name: Dinner Dance
